attributes.action: Save the United Kingdom : Halt the Break Up
attributes.additional_details:
Please complete these actions before triggering Brexit.

The independent inquiry will rate the outlook for each option plainly.
It will report within a timely period.
It will propose solutions to the concerns of all voters.
Such as:
* Local government powers/funding to manage migration growth within the UK internally.
* Dual UK/EU citizenship applications.

The referendum will provide a distinct range of options - hard to soft to halt Brexit.

This applies to all UK territory & countries.
attributes.background:
If the vote to Brexit starts either:
The break up of the UK, or
Separate EU treaties for separate UK countries.

Then Brexit will not cover the whole UK, as voted on.

Save our unity by:
A Public Inquiry into Brexit Viability, and then:
A Referendum on the Final Brexit Deal.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you would like a referendum on the UK's exit from the EU once terms have been negotiated, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134618
